description-2: Trump wins major Supreme Court case on presidential immunity.
description-3: The ruling limits prosecution of former presidents.
image: This decision could impact several ongoing cases.

description-2: Holds rally in Pennsylvania focusing on economic policy and immigration.
Participates in presidential debate with Vice President Kamala Harris.
description-3: The debate focused on economy and foreign policy.
image: Polls showed mixed reactions from viewers.

description-2: Delivers major policy speech outlining economic plans for second term.
